page.title: 05MEIR HEATH/R.CLOSE CARNIVAL
page.content: The Carnival takes place in the grounds of Meir Heath Primary School.First of all their is a parade around Meir Heath with a band and floats.When it arrives at the school someone well-known opens the carnival.It was held on Saturday,June 8th.They have lots of different events such as Tug-of-War and Fancy Dress.There are stalls of toys,plants,cakes and things to win.There is always a Carnival Queen and her Attendants.They are chosen at a disco about 2 months before the Carnival. The purpose of all this is so that Meir Heath can have a Village Hall.At the end there is a dance and the atmosphere is very busy.
